attributes.action: Make people aged 65+ years old retake their driving test and increase their insurance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been proven that reaction times of the elderly are far slower than that average driver. (sourced from The Highway Code). Not only this, but their eye sight shows signs of deterioration meaning they have difficulty spotting hazards or other vehicles. This endangers safe road users.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
